verses.verse: O give thanks<WH3034> to the LORD;<WH3068> for he is good:<WH2896> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
O give thanks<WH3034> to the God<WH430> of gods:<WH430> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
O give thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH113> of lords:<WH113> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him who alone<WH905> does<WH6213> great<WH1419> wonders:<WH6381> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him that by wisdom<WH8394> made<WH6213> the heavens:<WH8064> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him that stretched<WH7554> out the earth<WH776> above<WH5921> the waters:<WH4325> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him that made<WH6213> great<WH1419> lights:<WH216> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
The sun<WH8121> to rule<WH4475> by day:<WH3117> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
The moon<WH3394> and stars<WH3556> to rule<WH4475> by night:<WH3915> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him that smote<WH5221> Egypt<WH4714> in their firstborn:<WH1060> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
And brought<WH3318> out Israel<WH3478> from among<WH8432> them: for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
With a strong<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with a stretched<WH5186> out arm:<WH2220> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him which divided<WH1504> the Red<WH5488> sea<WH3220> into parts:<WH1506> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
And made Israel<WH3478> to pass<WH5674> through<WH8432> the middle<WH8432> of it: for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
But overthrew<WH5287> Pharaoh<WH6547> and his host<WH2428> in the Red<WH5488> sea:<WH3220> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him which led<WH3212> his people<WH5971> through the wilderness:<WH4057> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
To him which smote<WH5221> great<WH1419> kings:<WH4428> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
And slew<WH2026> famous<WH117> kings:<WH4428> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites:<WH567> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
And Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan:<WH1316> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
And gave<WH5414> their land<WH776> for an heritage:<WH5159> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
Even an heritage<WH5159> to Israel<WH3478> his servant:<WH5650> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
Who remembered<WH2142> us in our low<WH8213> estate: for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769>
And has redeemed<WH6561> us from our enemies:<WH6862> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
Who gives<WH5414> food<WH3899> to all<WH3605> flesh:<WH1320> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
O give thanks<WH3034> to the God<WH410> of heaven:<WH8064> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever.<WH5769>
